content: k2 skp k2 k2tog k2 around 48 sts round 6 k1 skp k2 k2tog k1 around 36 sts round 7 skp k2 k2tog around 24 sts round 8 k2tog around 12 sts cut yarn and thread a yarn needle with the end run the yarn end through each of the sts and pull tightly closed like a drawstring tie off to secure then weave in all ends if you like you can add a faux fur pom to the top or a yarn pom would be lovely as well you ve now completed your very own coziest autumn beanie i hope you enjoyed this fun knitting pattern be sure to sign up for our email newsletter so you don t miss the next one also i d love to see your work tag me in your photos on instagram using @thechesapeakeneedle #thechesapeakeneedle and #coziestautumnbeanie so that i can find you easily i just might share your photos on my page if you had fun using this pattern please consider sharing the link with a friend who might like to make it too you can also find me on pinterest thechesapeakeneedle ravelry lindseyfaciane and instagram @thechesapeakeneedle see you there
